page.title: 16LIFE AT CRESTWOOD SCHOOL
page.content: We started new at Crestwood, It's building is unique. The trees inside the crescent Will blossom out next week. They're planing down the benches Banging in the nails And soon in the metalwork room They'll be helping British Rail. Because it's so new It looks quite out of place Yes it's so new Like something from outer space. It's chips again for dinner, Salt and vinegar too And you should see the size of pizzas There's enough to feed a zoo. They're playing on the computer It's really fun and games It helps improve their spelling Now they call each other names.
